body_html: @drpngx @gunan I get your point. It's just that even documentation changes are run through the entire build process and all the unit tests. And although it's contrib, installing proper testing allows for a more dynamic work flow. They should not be treated as second-class citizens when it comes to testing.

body: @drpngx @gunan I get your point. It's just that even documentation changes are run through the entire build process and all the unit tests. And although it's `contrib`, installing proper testing allows for a more dynamic work flow. They should not be treated as second-class citizens when it comes to testing.
